name: So You See...
description:
Dhar Mann's channel has been getting weirder and weirder and weirder. YouTuber August the Duck has been captured by Dhar Mann. You must rescue him!

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move. You can jump by pressing the space bar, and sprint by pressing left shift. Click to proceed the dialogue.

Dhar Mann, August The Duck, bestgroup1234, please don't sue me.

This game was made for the Project Revival 2 Game jam.
